name: CTM Radio Lab 2026
venue: Various venues (Berghain, Volksbühne, Radialsystem, RSO.Berlin, House of Visionaries)
description: CTM Radio Lab 2026 is a commissioning program for experimental music, sound art, radio art, and performance under the festival theme 'dissonate < > resonate'. Selected artists will premiere new works exploring affection as a counterpoint to division and anxiety, transmitted through sound and music. The commissioned work receives €5,000 and will be broadcast on Deutschlandfunk Kultur's Klangkunst program and ORF platforms.
